text:
The Sul'asa ("the Burning Wood" in [[Shedani]]) is a region of [[Xen'drik]] surrounding the Obsidian City of [[Gundra'kul]], notable for the fiery color of its foliage. The ancestors of these odd plants were [[magebred|magebreeding]] by the [[Sulat League]], designed to thrive in the heat of the [[Fernia]]n [[manifest zone]] in this region.

Today, the Sul'asa is a dangerous region due to ongoing conflicts between the [[Vulkoori]] and [[Sulatu]] [[drow]], and foreign intruders are likely to draw the ire of both sides.
title: Sul'asa
